A[32]                             B[32]                              op[3] R[32]
00000000000000000000000000001010  00000000000000000000000000000011   000   00000000000000000000000000001101   # Add: 10+3 = 13
00000000000000000000000000010100  00000000000000000000000000000001   000   00000000000000000000000000010101   # Add: 20 + 1 = 21
11111111111111111111111111111011  00000000000000000000000000000001   000   11111111111111111111111111111100   # Add: -5 + 1 = -4

00000000000000000000000000001010  00000000000000000000000000000011   001   00000000000000000000000000000010   # And: 1010 and 0011 = 0010
00000000000000000000000011111111  00000000000000000000000000000000   001   00000000000000000000000000000000   # And: 11111111 and 0 = 0
00000000000000000000000000001111  00000000000000000000000000001010   001   00000000000000000000000000001010   # And: 1111 and 1010 = 1010

00000000000000000000000000001010  00000000000000000000000000000011   010   00000000000000000000000000001011   # Or: 1010 or 0011 = 1011
11111111111111111111111111111011  00000000000000000000000000000100   010   11111111111111111111111111111111   # Or: -5 or 4 = -1
00000000000000000000000000001111  00000000000000000000000000000000   010   00000000000000000000000000001111   # Or: 1111 or 0 = 1111

00000000000000000000000000001010  00000000000000000000000000000011   011   00000000000000000000000000001001   # XOR: 1010 xor 0011 = 1001
11111111111111111111111111111011  00000000000000000000000000000101   011   11111111111111111111111111111110   # XOR: -5 xor 5 = -2
00000000000000000000000010101010  00000000000000000000000001010101   011   00000000000000000000000011111111   # XOR: 10101010 xor 01010101 = 11111111

00000000000000000000000000001010  00000000000000000000000000000011   100   00000000000000000000000000000111   # Sub: 10-3 = 7
00000000000000000000000000001111  00000000000000000000000000010000   100   11111111111111111111111111111111   # Sub: 15 - 16 = -1
11111111111111111111111111111011  00000000000000000000000000000100   100   11111111111111111111111111110111   # Sub: -5 - 4 = -9

00000000000000000000000000001010  00000000000000000000000000000011   101   11111111111111111111111111110101   # Not: not 1010 = 0101
00000000000000000000000011111111  00000000000000000000000000000000   101   11111111111111111111111100000000   # Not: not 11111111 = 00000000
00000000000000000000000000000000  00000000000000000000000000000000   101   11111111111111111111111111111111   # Not: not 0 = 11111111111111111111111111111111

00000000000000000000000000001010  00000000000000000000000000001111   110   00000000000000000000000000000001   # SLT: 10 < 15 = 1
00000000000000000000000000001010  00000000000000000000000000000011   110   00000000000000000000000000000000   # SLT: 10 < 3 = 0
11111111111111111111111111111011  00000000000000000000000000000101   110   00000000000000000000000000000001   # SLT: -5 < 5 = 1
00000000000000000000000000000001  00000000000000000000000000000001   110   00000000000000000000000000000000   # SLT: 1 < 1 = 0
